item.description:
👤 Owner: bwya77

📝 Repository: bwya77/DockAnchor

📄 Descrizione: DockAnchor is a simple macOS utility that stops the Dock from moving between displays. Lock your Dock to a single screen for a more stable, distraction-free workspace. Ideal for multi-monitor setups. Lightweight, native, and runs quietly in the background.
